transportAdvice: Salvador has a metro system with limited coverage, supplemented by an extensive bus network that reaches most tourist areas including the historic Pelourinho district and coastal neighborhoods. Taxis and ride-hailing services are widely available, and while the historic center is walkable, hilly terrain and safety considerations make public or private transport preferable for longer distances.
